About

Just an ordinary about page

Mu-An Chiou (邱慕安).

I am a designer at GitHub and co-founder of Zeczec.

I am a Taiwanese from Taipei, have been in the UK for the past 5 years, currently based in London.

I started (trying) to do what I do now when I was 11, got into French in university but quickly dropped out, studied Product Design later instead, then went back doing web after graduated.

I like web much more, because on the internet you see the result much quicker, and I don’t have patience. You can find some of my product design works here.

For my fellow internet dwellers, I’m on Twitter, GitHub, Dribbble, and Instagram. There’s a XML Feed for my posts, and this site is opensource on GitHub.

The blog is built with Jekyll hosting on GitHub Pages.
